attack.name: Counter: Damage 10
attack.description: You can inflict damage by making a close attack. The exact nature of your Damage is up to you; it can be anything from a powerful impact to razor claws, energy fields, or some other damaging medium with the GM's permission. The target resists Damage with Toughness.

attack.name: Damage: Strength-based Damage 3
attack.description: You can inflict damage by making a close attack. The exact nature of your Damage is up to you; it can be anything from a powerful impact to razor claws, energy fields, or some other damaging medium with the GM's permission. The target resists Damage with Toughness.

attack.name: Grab
attack.description: You can make a Grab attack to restrain or bind your opponent.

attack.name: Overwhelming Chatter: Weaken 14
attack.description: You can temporarily lower one of a target's traits, chosen when this effect is acquired. You must touch the target, making a normal close attack check. Multiple failed resistance checks against a Weaken effect are cumulative, up to a maximum of the Weaken rank, at which point the effect cannot weaken the trait further. Lost points return at a rate of 1 per round at the end of each of the target's turns. Inanimate objects do not recover weakened Toughness; they must be repaired. Objects may or may not recover other weakened traits, at the GM's discretion and depending on the effect's descriptors.

attack.name: Roach Assault: Affliction 8
attack.description: You can impose some debilitating condition or conditions on a target by making a close attack. You set the conditions your Affliction causes at each degree when you acquire it and they may not be changed. Higher degree conditions replace lower degree conditions and do not stack with them. See the possible conditions for each degree under the Affliction Resistance Check table. The target resists with Fortitude or Will defense (chosen when you take the effect).

attack.name: Roach Cloud Cover: Burst Area Concealment Attack 5
attack.description:
You gain total concealment from a particular sense while this effect is active, although you are still detectable to other senses (even other senses of the same sense type; so you could have full concealment against normal sight, but not infravision or any other sense in the sight sense type). Each additional rank gives you concealment from another sense; two ranks give you concealment for an entire sense type.
Concealment from visual senses costs double (2 ranks for one visual sense, 4 ranks for all visual senses). You cannot have concealment from tactile senses, since that requires being incorporeal (see the Insubstantial effect). So with Concealment 5, you can have total concealment from all visual senses (4 ranks) and normal hearing (1 rank), for example. With Concealment 10 you have total concealment from all sense types other than tactile.

attack.name: Roach Hunger: Strength-based Damage 12
attack.description: You can inflict damage by making a close attack. The exact nature of your Damage is up to you; it can be anything from a powerful impact to razor claws, energy fields, or some other damaging medium with the GM's permission. The target resists Damage with Toughness.

attack.name: Swarming Nuisance: Cumulative Affliction 14

You set the conditions your Affliction causes at each degree when you acquire it and they may not be changed. Higher degree conditions replace lower degree conditions and do not stack with them. See the possible conditions for each degree under the Affliction Resistance Check table. The target resists with Fortitude or Will defense (chosen when you take the effect).

item.name: Dropped to Ground (empty)
item.description: Any equipment dropped to the ground is held in this container. You can move an item from one container to another by clicking the "Gear" button beside its info button.

item.name: Grab
item.description: You can make a Grab attack to restrain or bind your opponent.

complication.name: Acceptance
complication.description: Roach-Boy craves acceptance, especially from the Super-Hero community or figues of authority. He is at risk of being manipulated by less than savory people who prey on his desire to be mentored by someone he sees as anestablished hero, and by his desire for friends who are heroic.

complication.name: Cockroaches cant be everywhere
complication.description: Roach Control and his Roach Warning System only work if cockroaches are able to be available on mass. This is not a problem for dirty, or even moderately clean areas. Pristine areas may take awhile for cockroaches to appear, sealed areas are an impossibility.

complication.name: Enemy: Evil Experimenter
complication.description: Roach-boy is on a constant lookout for the evil doctor that is contiuing to kidnap people off the streets and transform them into monstrosoties that do his evil bidding. Roach-boy has disrupted his plans in the past and made a powerful enemy.

complication.name: Enemy: The Department Of Urban Sanitation
complication.description:
DOUSe has beent tasked with cleanng up the city, and oversees the effort to demolish and urbanifiy some of the more decrebid ghettoes in town. They have been responsible for forcibly removing undesirable elements from certain neibohoods before demolition and rebuild.
Roach-boy in his defense of the homeless has interfered numerous times with DOUSe, who also have a special department that deals with super powered pests eg Sewer Reptile Monsters, Rodent and Bat Creatures, and yes of course Insect powered nusiances.

complication.name: Gross
complication.description:
Roach- Boy's appearance and powers bring about disgust in almost everyone. He is shunned by every day people. He is often mistaken as a villain, and police will often fire at him on sight. The tablid press love to right fabricated stories about his monstrous acts. Other super heroes even look at him initially with revulsion and contempt.
Roach-boy often has to win acceptance through heroics and his noble behavior.

complication.name: Motivation:Guilty Savior Complex
complication.description:
Roach-Boy failed to save the other victims of experimentation that caused his transformation. A core number of his street people 'family' that were kidnapped by the evil (what do we call this guy). When he had a chance to escape, he took it. When we finally came to his senses and returned for his adopted family, it was to late.
As a result, roach-Bot is always looking to assuage his guilt by trying to save everyone he can.

complication.name: Responsibility: Street People Family
complication.description:
Roach-Boy was informally adopted by a tight night group of home-less / near homeless people from a very young age, when he was fleeing an abusive family, and an unsympathetic system.
Roach-boy is extremely protective of this group of people and of homeless people in general. He is also an active defender of the poor and people who are just on the fringe of becoming destitute. He spends a good portion of his time at holmeless shelters and food banks, helping in any way he can.
Roach-boy in particular is commited to improving the lives of his adopted troup of street folks, doing what he can to get them of the street.

complication.name: Weakness: Insectiside
complication.description: Chemicals specifically designed to target insects, arthrapods, etc will do extra damage to Roach-Boy. Cleaning Agent related powers and attacks will also have extra effect and send his roaches scurrying, removing many of his powers.
